room_title: Escape room "Moonshine Hootenanny" by Gatlin's Escape Games in Pigeon Forge
review: My wife and I had never done an escape room before, and we both enjoyed the Hootenanny experience. Our host kept it light and entertaining, and provided the right hints and clues to help us win. Experienced escape artists might find this one too easy, but for us it was just right! Highly recommended for a fun hour while in Gatlinburg.

room_title: Escape room "Moonshine Hootenanny" by Gatlin's Escape Games in Pigeon Forge
review: My husband and I along with two teenagers had a great time. We did Atlantis and hillbilly hootenanny and they were both fun.

room_title: Escape room "Moonshine Hootenanny" by Gatlin's Escape Games in Pigeon Forge
review: The Big Bertha room was worth every dollar! Such a great time! Our host Beth was awesome. Will definitely be returning. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Moonshine Hootenanny" by Gatlin's Escape Games in Pigeon Forge
review: Played the Moonshine Hootnnanny with only myself and my 8-year-old son. We didn't finish but we both had SO much fun. It was the highlight of our trip. I will definitely be visiting again! Highly recommended.
